   Bill O'Reilly
   stated on July 27, 2015 in an interview on "The O'Reilly Factor":
   Russia and China "absolutely said pretty clearly" they would not keep
   economic sanctions on Iran if the United States "walked away from the
   deal."

Conventional wisdom

   As part of the nuclear agreement, the United States, Russia, China,
   France, Britain and Germany agreed to phase out various economic sanctions
   that have crippled Iran’s economy in exchange for concessions in Iran’s
   nuclear program.

Our ruling

   O’Reilly said that Russia and China "absolutely said pretty clearly" they
   would not keep economic sanctions on Iran if the United States "walked
   away from the deal."

false false
